page.title: 13Brownies
page.content: I go to a Brownie pack in Alcester we are called the 1st Alcester pack. We meet every Tuesday at 6.30 pm and finish at 7.30 pm. During that time we play games and work for badges. Brownies was founded by Lord Baden Powell's wife. We have a Brownie handbook which tells us about the badges and other things. Some of the badges we work for are first aid, agility, artist, swimmer, skater, collectors, jester, safety in the home, house orderly, hostess, reader, pet lover, writer and athelete. We wear a uniform which consists of a yellow tie with a silver trefoil on, a brown hat with a bobble on, a brown belt and a brown dress. When you are ten or eleven you go up to Guides.
